member.name: M:Biod.Zebra.Api.Api.Analytics.ZebraAnalyticsEmailController.ZebraAnalyticsGetEmail(System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the list of emails for a specific user ID or Email, email Type, or in a specific date range if parameters are provided.
member.remarks:
Date formats can be in the form of: yyyy, yyyy-MM, yyyy-MM-dd, yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss
For start date, any unfilled units will default to the earliest time possible (e.g. 2019 will become 2019-01-01T00:00:00)
For end date, any unfilled units will default to the latest time possible (e.g. 2019 will become 2019-12-31T23:59:59)
member.returns: the list of emails for the given query

member.name: M:Biod.Zebra.Api.Api.Analytics.ZebraAnalyticsEmailController.ZebraAnalyticsGetEmailContentById(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the body content of the Email given an email id
member.returns: the body content of the email

member.summary: Gets the list of user logins for a specific user ID or in a specific date range if parameters are provided.
member.remarks:
Date formats can be in the form of: yyyy, yyyy-MM, yyyy-MM-dd, yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss
For start date, any unfilled units will default to the earliest time possible (e.g. 2019 will become 2019-01-01T00:00:00)
For end date, any unfilled units will default to the latest time possible (e.g. 2019 will become 2019-12-31T23:59:59)
member.returns: the list of logins for the given query

member.name: M:Biod.Zebra.Api.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator.GenerateObject(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates an object for a given type. The type needs to be public, have a public default constructor and settable public properties/fields. Currently it supports the following types: Simple types: , , , , , etc. Complex types: POCO types. Nullables: . Arrays: arrays of simple types or complex types. Key value pairs: Tuples: , , etc Dictionaries: or anything deriving from . Collections: , , , , , or anything deriving from or . Queryables: , .
member.returns: An object of the given type.
